Richard Gordon (born 1960) is a Scottish radio and television presenter.
Gordon, an ex-banker, was born and educated in Aberdeen at Skene Square Primary, Aberdeen Grammar School and Aberdeen College of Commerce.
He is the host of BBC Radio Scotland's football programme Sportsound and occasionally presents the Fred MacAulay weekday morning show on BBC Radio Scotland.
He previously hosted the Scottish Premier League highlights on Sportscene from 2008 to 2010.
He is a supporter of Aberdeen Football Club and has regularly contributed to their matchday programme.
